pic1_alt: Heart shaped cookies with red and white frosting, with the words Love, and Love you on them. Text with Holiday and Seasonal trends Valentine's Day
pic2_alt: Line plot of percent of people celebrating Valentine's Day over the years from 2007 to 2024. The general trend is that the percent celebrating decreases over time. 63% celebrated in 2007. 53% are planning to celebrate in 2024. In 2013 60% of people celebrated, and in 2014 that decreased to 54% and has remained consistent around that percentage since then.
